Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Ne toto ye niye waloonga eshisatsa nende eshikhasi
Netoto mbu kali khuye okhulamusibwa khandi
Naye	niye	Nyasaye	Omuleli wetsing’ining’ini tsia (shiira)
Nende Abandu ba Nuhu abaliho imbeli, Toto bali ababii muno ebitsimbi po
Mana nitsimbabaasi shina tsia Nyasaye wuwo tsiokanakananga
Ne nibalola eshimanyisio shiosi shiosi bashifutarira nibaboola mbu “ buno nobulosi butsilililanga”
Ne baingasia ne nibaloonda okhwenya khwabu, ne buli likhuwa liemekhwa
Netoto kamala okhuboolela amakhuwa kalimwo obwalaba
Amachesi kafung’anile, halali amekanyilisio shikakhoonya eshindu khubo tawe
Mana lekhana ninabo. Inyanga yalilaanga omulaanji okhutsiila likhuwa lio mwoyo kwakhaya
